text: I was working on this project and was just about to run this R code that I wrote that would parse ~ million files and extract some info form them. I left the script running on a remote machine and run off to catch my train. When I sshed to the machine 30 minutes later, it was still running. Out of boredom, I rewrote the logic in julia and to my amazement, it finished in 20 seconds. So I cancelled the R job and started reading the Julia docs...

Out of boredom, I rewrote the logic in julia and to my amazement, it finished in 20 seconds. So I cancelled the R job and started reading the Julia docs...

text: but anyway, welcome to the community! Hope you enjoy using Julia
